item.description: 2022 I plan to populate this page with occasional posts, reflections and/or tutorials. Stay tuned, this is work in progress.

item.title: Code
item.description: This website was created in R Studio using Ivy Theme and is deployed using Netlify. https://github.com/rbind/yihui I love the clean look and the simple structure of this site. I am yet to figure out the customizing of domains on Github via personal pages… You can see the code/repository here

item.title: Work Areas
item.description: ADOLESCENT and YOUNG ADULT ONCOLOGY I first became interested in Adolescents and Young Adults (AYA) when I shadowed and volunteered as a student at Smilow Yale-New Haven Cancer Hospital. I had the chance to observe the entire patient pathway on the pediatric as well as adult wards. What struck me was that, despite often being more tragic cases, pediatric ward had a much more upbeat energy. Fertility preservation in young people with cancer in Europe I have started collaborating with Youth Cancer Europe in 2019.
